General.Name: Leshan Electric Power Co Ltd
General.Description: Leshan Electric Power Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a power company in China. It also operates in the natural gas, tap water, sewage treatment, hotel services, photovoltaic new energy, and other fields. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Leshan, China.
General.Address: No. 46, Jiading North Road, Leshan, China, 614000

2.Name: Mr. Xun  Wang
